moves.1. h4 c5: this is always my first move if i am black
moves.3. d3 e5 4. Rh3: here i thought: what if i do d7-d5? then i could get the rook with my bishop
moves.5... Bxh3: then i took his rook XD
moves.6. gxh3: he took my bishop with his pawn
moves.7. Nf3 O-O-O: here i thought: if the pawn from d3 goes away it would be checkmate
moves.8. b3 e4: i did this so his pawn could get away
